description: The function should return a list where each element is the sum of the elements in the input lists at the respective indices.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function should return a list where each element is the sum of the elements in the input lists at the respective indices. def list_summation(lst1, lst2): return [x + y for x, y in zip(lst1, lst2 - 1)]
